timeline.body:
```suggestion
     * @deprecated Text Blocks should be returned with Submission. Please use V2 text assessment which does not need this API call. This API call will be removed soon.
```
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @deprecated Text Blocks should be returned with Submission.
          
          
            
                 * @deprecated Text Blocks should be returned with Submission. Please use V2 text assessment which does not need this API call. This API call will be removed soon.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* @deprecated Text Blocks should be returned with Submission.
* @deprecated Text Blocks should be returned with Submission. Please use V2 text assessment which does not need this API call. This API call will be removed soon.
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -190,11 +209,13 @@ public TextAssessmentResource(AuthorizationCheckService authCheckService, Result
      * Splits the TextSubmission corresponding to a resultId into TextBlocks.
      * The TextBlocks get a suggested feedback if automatic assessment is enabled and feedback available
      *
+     * @deprecated Text Blocks should be returned with Submission.

timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: Also explain the fall back solution here
replies.author: krusche
